heading: Elite States
paragraph: A real estate platform that allows users to search for properties, view details, and contact agents. It features a user-friendly interface and responsive design.
author: Idowu Joseph
challenges: Implementing a secure and efficient property search functionality.
Ensuring responsive design for various devices.
futurePlans: Add a feature for users to save favorite properties.
Implement a review system for properties.

heading: Netflix Clone
paragraph: A clone of the popular streaming platform, featuring user authentication, video playback, and a responsive design.
author: Idowu Joseph
challenges: Implementing video playback functionality with responsive design.
Ensuring smooth user authentication and session management.
futurePlans: Implement a recommendation system based on user preferences.
